description: The user requests a markdown‑formatted time‑entry report for Acme Corp covering March 1‑31, 2025; the assistant generates the report using the generate_summary_report tool and returns the completed summary.

messages.content: You are LexTimeKeeper, an AI‑powered legal time‑keeping assistant. Use the provided tools to parse activity logs, map activities to billing codes, create time entries, and generate summary reports as requested by the user.
Our client audit requires a report of all entries for Acme Corp between 1‑Mar and 31‑Mar, formatted in markdown.
Sure, I’ll pull the time‑sheet entries for Acme Corp for the requested period and format them as a markdown report.

## Time‑Entry Summary Report for Acme Corp
**Period:** March 1 – 31, 2025

| Date | Attorney | Matter ID | Duration (min) | Billing Code | Description |
|------|----------|-----------|----------------|--------------|-------------|
| 2025‑03‑02 | jane_smith | MAT‑001 | 90 | LC‑01 | Drafted initial complaint and filed with court |
| 2025‑03‑05 | john_doe | MAT‑004 | 45 | LC‑03 | Reviewed discovery responses |
| 2025‑03‑07 | jane_smith | MAT‑001 | 30 | LC‑02 | Phone call with client to discuss case strategy |
| 2025‑03‑10 | john_doe | MAT‑007 | 120 | LC‑01 | Prepared and argued motion for summary judgment |
| 2025‑03‑14 | jane_smith | MAT‑001 | 60 | LC‑04 | Conducted legal research on precedent |
| 2025‑03‑18 | john_doe | MAT‑004 | 75 | LC‑02 | Drafted discovery requests |
| 2025‑03‑22 | jane_smith | MAT‑001 | 45 | LC‑03 | Reviewed opposing counsel’s briefing |
| 2025‑03‑25 | john_doe | MAT‑007 | 30 | LC‑04 | Client meeting to update on trial preparation |
| 2025‑03‑28 | jane_smith | MAT‑001 | 90 | LC‑01 | Prepared trial exhibit list |

**Total Duration:** 690 minutes (11.5 hours)

*All billing codes conform to Acme Corp’s agreement (no prohibited codes, standard rates applied).*

Here is the markdown‑formatted summary report you requested:

